author: Shane Goldmacher
description: Democrats meddled to boost State Senator Darren Bailey in the G.O.P. primary for Illinois governor. But efforts to elevate far-right candidates in Colorado fizzled.
title: Illinois Governor’s Race Shows G.O.P.’s Lurch to Right (With Nudge From Left)

author: Alexandra E. Petri
description: After Title IX passed in 1972, administrators found soccer to be a cheap way to comply. And participation rates soared in high schools, universities and at club levels for girls and women.
title: Once an ‘Easy Way Out’ for Equality, Women’s Soccer Is Now a U.S. Force
content: Brooke Volza and the other girls who play in the top division of high school soccer in Albuquerque know all about the Metro Curse: The team that wins the citys metro tournament at the start of the se… [+927 chars]

author: Nicole Wetsman
description: Apple’s new medication alert feature on iPhone and Apple Watch could help some people remember to take needed drugs. But medication adherence is a hard problem to solve, and experts don’t know how much apps help improve health.
title: Apple’s medication feature is a step in the right direction
content:
Image: Apple

author: Associated Press
description: Three passengers were taken from the scene to University Hospital in Columbia, hospital spokesman Eric Maze said. He did not have information on their conditions.
title: Amtrak Train Carrying 243 People Derails in Missouri: Injuries Reported
content:
(MENDON, Mo.) — A passenger train traveling from Los Angeles to Chicago derailed in Missouri on Monday afternoon and initial reports indicate that some people aboard were injured, Amtrak said.
